attributes.action: MR DAVID CAMERON TO CONTINUE AS PRIME MINISTER OF THE UNITED KINGDOM
attributes.additional_details: I FEEL THAT HE SHOULD CONTINUE AS PRIME MINISTER UNTIL THE NEXT GENERAL ELECTION,    AFTER THE FANTASTIC EFFORTS HE MADE TO CONVINCE THE BRITISH PUBLIC TO REMAIN IN EUROPE.  I WAS VERY MUCH IN FAVOUR OF "LEAVE" BUT AFTER HIS PLEA  ON 22 JUNE,  HIS ARGUMENTS  CONVINCED THE BRITISH PUBLIC  THAT THEY  MADE SENSE.  I HAVE BEEN IN THIS COUNTRY FOR OVER 55 YEARS AND SEEN MANY PRIME MINISTERS COME AND GO, BUT NEVER ONE WHO HAS MATCHED MR DAVID CAMERON. THE MEDIA HAS BEEN RESPONSIBLE FOR HIS DEFEAT.
attributes.background:
OUR PRIME MINISTER HAS BEEN THE BEST PRIME MINISTER WE HAVE HAD A FOR A LONG TIME.

HE HAS DONE A LOT TO CONVINCE THE MEMBERS OF THE PUBLIC THAT BRITAIN SHOULD REMAIN IN  EUROPE.

THIS GENUINE EFFORTS SHOULD NOT BE WASTED.
